title: DoorSafe Lock
description: DoorSafe Lock is a smart door locking mechanism controlled via smartphone using Raspberry Pi, enhancing security and convenience.
introduction: In an era of smart homes, DoorSafe Lock revolutionizes traditional locking systems by integrating Raspberry Pi technology. This project aims to provide a secure, convenient, and remote-controlled solution for door locking, making it easier to manage access and ensure safety.

sections.title: Motivation
sections.body: The motivation behind DoorSafe Lock stems from the need for enhanced home security and convenience. Traditional locks often lack remote access and real-time monitoring, leading to potential security vulnerabilities. By leveraging Raspberry Pi and smartphone integration, we aimed to create a system that offers both security and ease of use.

sections.title: Initial Prototype
sections.body: The initial prototype involved setting up a Raspberry Pi to control a electronic lock mechanism. We used Python to develop a simple server that communicates with a smartphone app. The app was built using Flutter, enabling cross-platform compatibility. Initial challenges included ensuring reliable communication between the Pi and the lock, which was resolved by implementing a robust GPIO setup.

sections.title: Smartphone App Development
sections.body: The smartphone app was designed to provide a user-friendly interface for locking and unlocking the door. Features included real-time notifications, access logs, and a remote control interface. We faced challenges in ensuring low-latency communication, which was addressed by optimizing the server response times and implementing WebSocket protocol.

sections.title: AI-Powered Security Features
sections.body: To enhance security, we integrated AI-powered features such as facial recognition and anomaly detection. Using OpenCV and TensorFlow Lite, we developed a system that verifies users before granting access. This added an extra layer of security and convenience, making DoorSafe Lock more robust and user-friendly.

sections.title: Current Features
sections.body: DoorSafe Lock currently offers remote locking/unlocking, real-time notifications, access logs, facial recognition, and anomaly detection. The system is fully integrated with Raspberry Pi and can be controlled via a smartphone app. We also implemented a backup power system to ensure functionality during power outages.

sections.title: Future Plans
sections.body: Future plans include integrating DoorSafe Lock with popular smart home systems like Alexa and Google Home. We also aim to add biometric authentication and advanced AI-driven security analytics. Additionally, we plan to commercialize the product, making it available for residential and commercial use.
